translations: n.（Godson）人名；（法）戈德松；（英）戈德森

phrs.translation: 干儿子, 龙芯, 教子, 高驰

sentences.sentence: The latest Godson chips will also have a number of advanced features.
sentences.translation: 最新一代的Godson芯片拥有一些先进的技术。

sentences.sentence: I miss my niece, Erin. And my godson, Bryan, the only survivor — I love him and think of him every day.
sentences.translation: 我想念我的侄女Erin，和我唯一活下来了的教子bryan，我非常爱他，并且每天都在想念他。

sentences.sentence: With its eight additional cores, this should make the 3c about four times as fast as the Godson 3b.
sentences.translation: 加上比3 B多出来8个核，龙芯3 C有可能比3 B快四倍以上。
